activation.reactionTrigger: a creature misses you with an attack

system.description:
Requirements: A set of manacles, not wielding a shield or two-handed weapon.

When a creature up to one size category larger or smaller than you misses you with an attack, you may use your reaction to lock yourself to the creature with the manacles. As long as you and the creature are locked to each other this way, you are considered to be grappling each other. The target must break or escape the manacles as normal to escape the grapple, but you can end it as a bonus action.
